snippet.title: FreeQuranEducation
snippet.description: We are world's Largest Non Profit Animation and illustration Studio based in Jakarta. Our aim is simple: To make Education Universal, Free, state of the art and available to every human being with an Internet connection. In sha Allah (God- willing).

snippet.title: Mufti Menk
snippet.description:
Dr Mufti Ismail Menk is a leading global Islamic scholar & motivational speaker born & raised in Zimbabwe.

He studied Shariah in Madinah & holds a Doctorate of Social Guidance from Aldersgate University.

Mufti Menk's work has gained worldwide recognition and he has been named one of "The Top 500 Most Influential Muslims in the World" since 2010. 

Mufti Menk received the prestigious Jewels of the Muslims World Award from the OIC Today in Malaysia in 2017. 

He has millions of followers across his social media platforms. Mufti Menk's personable style and down to earth approach has made him one of the most sought after scholars in our time. He has endeared himself to people with his much loved lecture series, a Mufti Menk trademark. 

He travels the world spreading a simple but profound message: "Do good, help others while preparing for the Hereafter". 

He is active in the international arena and is a strong proponent of peace and justice, speaking up against all forms of terrorism.

snippet.title: Cocombee
snippet.description:
"Sampaikan dariku walaupun satu ayat" (HR Bukhari).

Cocombee menghimpunkan video-video nasihat ringkas dari para habaib, ustaz dan alim ulama Ahlu Sunnah Wal Jamaah. Tujuannya ialah untuk menyampaikan risalah yang Nabi Muhammad SAW bawa, yaitu peringatan / nasihat dan kabar gembira dari Allah SWT melalui Al-Quran dan Hadits.

snippet.title: Oemar Mita Syameela
snippet.description:
SYAMEELA 

- Menebar Ilmu Menjalin Ukhuwah Bersama Ustadz. Oemar Mita, Lc. - 

Layanan pembelajaran Al-Qur'an dan Ilmu keislaman dengan menghadirkan ustadz atau da‚Äôi ke masjid, kantor maupun rumah.
Ketersediaan waktu maupun tempat kegiatan sesuai permintaan peserta atau penuntut ilmu.
Peserta juga dapat datang ke tempat kajian rutin Kami di : Bintaro, Pamulang, Ciracas, Jakarta, Bekasi, Bogor, Depok dll

Tujuan utama Syameela adalah menyampaikan ilmu dan dakwah pada masyarakat, mengenai biaya transport pengajar atau ustadz bersifat fleksibel dan bisa dimusyawarahkan dengan admin.

snippet.title: Al-Bahjah TV
snippet.description:
Saluran Resmi Majelis Al-Bahjah Dibawah Asuhan Buya Yahya.

~~~~~BUYA YAHYA PROFILE~~~~~
Buya Yahya is an indonesian islamic preacher (born on 10 August 1973) and the founder of Dawah Development Foundation and Islamic Boarding School Al-Bahjah in Cirebon. His teaching based on ahlus sunnah wal jama‚Äôah as‚Äôariyah sufiyah ideology. He attended Darullughah Wadda‚Äôwah in Bangil Pasuruan East Java. In 1996, he went to Al-Ahgaff University in Yemen. He had been studied about Fiqh (Islamic laws) for 9 years. He ever taught Tarbiyah Faculty and Dirosah Islamiah  for 3 years in Yemen.

snippet.title: Nabawi TV
snippet.description:
Nabawi TV adalah televisi dakwah yang mengusung visi dan misi dakwah Ahlusunnah Walajamaah. Nabawi TV selalu hadir dengan video taklim bertema seputar masalah keseharian mulai dari fikih, tasawuf, sampai amalan sehari-hari.

Nabawi TV juga menyajikan beragam video taklim dari ulama-ulama terkemuka. Semua konten video berbasis pada nilai dakwah yang sejuk, tidak politis, tidak provokatif, dan bersifat merangkul (Rahmatan Lil Allamin), sehingga Nabawi TV sangat layak Anda rekomendasikan kepada keluarga, sahabat, atau teman.

 The official Youtube Channel for Shaikh Mishari Rashed Alafasy

Shaikh Mishary is a Kuwaiti Qari, Imam, preacher, and Nasheed artist. Mishary was awarded the first Arab Creativity Oscar by the Arab Creativity Union in Egypt in 2008
Alafasy launched his new App on Android and IOS which includes exclusive Quranic readings and nasheeds. Download it for free from the links below

localized.title: Alafasy
localized.description:
Shaikh Mishary Bin Rashid AlAfasy

Nationality: Kuwait

Date of Birth: September 5, 1976.

Shaikh Alafasy is a dedicated Imam and Islamic preacher in the Islamic Affairs of Kuwait
